review_title: Working for red cross gave me the opportunity to meet some good people that were willing to help you.
pros: Red cross gives you the opportunity to get practice on your field.
cons: Some of the jobs site people got a little scare when you are willing to do anything you are ask to do. Job security..

review_title: The Best most extraordinary organization I could ever volunteer with and will continue to volunteer for.
pros: Uncomparable to any... there is a reason why Clara Barton put this organization together with the inspiration and assistance of Henry Dunant.
cons: By far no cons...everyday there are more and more ideas that come to mind from all volunteers around the world

job_title: Office Lead in Frankfurt am Main
pros: The Red Cross is a great way to get your foot inside the door and make connections. Because they are a volunteer organization, there are countless opportunities to get involved, no matter your skill level or experience.
cons: Occasional lack of communication, not enough paid positions overseas, lack of appropriate support from NHQ.

pros: Very friendly environment with a great cause. Diverse working tasks keeps the work fresh.
cons: Sometimes unclear of what is to be done or too many projects at once.
